candles.title: Bergamot & Patchouli
candles.description: Decadent & multi layered scent that invigorates & soothes. Bergamot's fresh, bright, and uplifting aroma combined with the deep musk of patchouli makes this candle a firm favourite.

candles.title: Coconut & Lime
candles.description: Tropical and fruity, this scent is a rich blend of coconut, limes, orange, lemon and a hint of strawberry onto a heart of coconut, peach and floral nuances all resting on a sweet base of vanilla, sugar and musk.

candles.title: Tobacco & Oak
candles.description: A woody aroma of dry dusty tobacco, soft bergamot and sun sweetened mandarin. Hints of rock rose, black pepper and roasted nutmeg are accompanied by a heart of patchouli and gentle tobacco flower, leading to a rich base of sandalwood, sensual amber, leather and musk.

candles.title: Clove & Orange
candles.description: An herbal eruption, this crowd pleaser has top notes of pine, eucalyptus, orange, pear, cassis, green leaf, galbanum and strawberry, a heart of rose, hyacinth, gardenia, orange blossom, cinnamon, clove and peach on a base of cedar, sandalwood, amber, patchouli, sugar, musk and vanilla.

candles.title: Amber & Citrus
candles.description: Fresh and complicated, prepare for juicy oranges, mandarins, tangerines and bergamot combined with a base of rich dry woods including patchouli and sandalwood nestled on a base of dark amber and musk.

candles.title: Cinnamon & Saffron
candles.description: A little spicy, a little sweet, this blend of saffron, cinnamon and mixed spice creates a rich and warming scent that works for winter or summer.

candles.title: Black Lavender
candles.description: Fresh and familiar. A dash of citrus compliments soothing notes of lavender, grounded by a deep base of black amber and oak.

candles.title: Oudh & Bergamot
candles.description: Hypnotic and smoky, the luxurious notes of citrus and bergamot, underpinned with the intensity of Oud creates a serene richness that evokes a favourite Spa.

candles.title: Neroli & Jasmine
candles.description: A refreshing harmony of citrus and floral, derived from orange blossom with heart notes of eucalyptus and jasmine on a base of musk.

candles.title: Spiced Maple
candles.description: A sweet and spicy festive treat, embrace the winter season with top notes of orange and cinnamon and a warm sweet base of vanilla and maple.

diffusers.title: Jasmine & Musk
diffusers.description: Woody and floral, this aromatic fusion of bergamot, citrus and juniper, with heart notes of jasmine grounded on an earthy base of amber, musk, and patchouli.

diffusers.title: Coconut & Lime
diffusers.description: Tropical and fruity, this scent is a rich blend of coconut, limes, orange, lemon and a hint of strawberry onto a heart of coconut, peach and floral nuances all resting on a sweet base of vanilla, sugar and musk.
